name: Tea Time
text: Fusion Summon 1 "Bryant, Bryant of Bryant" using monsters you control as material. You can discard this card; add 1 "Kingdoms:" or "Tea" card from your Deck to your hand. If this card is in your GY whilst you control 3 "Kingdoms:" monsters with different names; you can add this card to your hand. You can banish this card from the GY while you control 1 "Bryant, Bryant of Bryant", add 1 "Tea" card from your Deck to your Hand. You can only use this effect of "Tea Time" once per duel.
